content: säde placemats suomenkielinen esittely alempana säde is finnish word and means ray cotton yarn is perfect for these placemats size you get the diameter of the placemats by following this pattern diameter will be about 30 - 31 cm 12 - 12 5 with size e / 3 5 mm hook one placemat takes about 65 g yarn this is a written pattern it is written with us terms there are only basic stitches in the pattern chain slip_stitch double_crochet and reverse single_crochet pattern starts with magic_ring remember to sew yarn end in before cutting the yarn if you prefer more traditional start feel free to use it the pattern is for personal use only pattern is tested thank you for your help emma mousumi and jovette share your picture on ig #sädeplacemats säde tabletin ohje löytyy ilmaiseksi blogista https //tiitunlabra com/2022/01/12/sade-tabletit-ohje/
